title: panic: slice bounds out of range
body:
Erigon version: `./erigon --version` git_tag: v2022.06.06 git_commit: 7724089985bf9cb8bb7d1bde92892256a6af859f

can not reproduce bug,

command:
```
erigon --chain=bsc --prune=hrtc --prune.h.older=5000 --prune.r.older=5000 --prune.t.older=5000 --prune.c.older=5000 --datadir=erigon --db.pagesize=16k
```

logs:
